<h3 id="X39870">X(39870) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-AQUILA TO 9th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^6-(b+c)*a^5-(3*b^2-2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^4-2*(b+c)*b*c*a^3+2*(b-c)^2*b*c*a^2+(b^4-c^4)*(b-c)*a-(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39870) = 3*X(1)+X(39878) = 3*X(1)-X(39898) = X(4)-3*X(16475) = 2*X(5)-3*X(38049) = 2*X(10)-3*X(38118) = X(40)-3*X(25406) = X(69)-3*X(3576) = 2*X(141)-3*X(10165) = 4*X(182)-3*X(38118) = X(193)+3*X(5731) = X(355)-3*X(5050) = X(944)+3*X(14912) = 2*X(1125)-3*X(38029) = X(1352)-3*X(38029) = X(3416)-3*X(5085) = X(3751)-3*X(14912) = 3*X(5085)-2*X(6684) = X(5882)+2*X(8550) = 3*X(6776)-X(39878) = 3*X(6776)+X(39898)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(39870) lies on these lines: {1,6776}, {2,39885}, {3,5847}, {4,16475}, {5,38049}, {6,515}, {10,182}, {40,25406}, {69,3576}, {141,10165}, {193,5731}, {355,5050}, {511,4297}, {516,24257}, {518,5882}, {519,11179}, {542,551}, {611,10106}, {613,950}, {730,13354}, {944,3751}, {946,1386}, {999,39883}, {1125,1352}, {1210,1428}, {1319,39873}, {1351,18481}, {1353,34773}, {1385,3564}, {1469,4311}, {2330,31397}, {2646,39897}, {2784,12177}, {2792,3663}, {3056,4304}, {3242,13607}, {3295,39877}, {3416,5085}, {3589,10175}, {3616,5921}, {3618,5587}, {3626,38116}, {3817,3818}, {3827,5884}, {3828,38064}, {4663,12007}, {5092,10164}, {5135,12616}, {5138,6245}, {5182,9864}, {5450,36740}, {5476,34648}, {5480,31673}, {5603,16491}, {5622,13211}, {5691,14853}, {5846,11362}, {5848,11715}, {5886,18440}, {6001,34774}, {6702,38119}, {6796,36741}, {7967,16496}, {7987,10519}, {9955,38040}, {9956,38110}, {10246,39899}, {10755,12119}, {11061,33535}, {11178,19883}, {11180,25055}, {11230,18358}, {11363,39871}, {11364,39872}, {11365,39879}, {11366,39880}, {11367,39881}, {11368,39882}, {11370,39887}, {11371,39888}, {11373,39889}, {11374,39890}, {11375,39891}, {11376,39892}, {11377,39895}, {11378,39896}, {11831,39886}, {12005,24476}, {12017,26446}, {12114,37492}, {12407,25320}, {12588,13411}, {12610,29046}, {12675,34381}, {13464,38315}, {13883,19145}, {13936,19146}, {14561,19925}, {16174,38050}, {16192,33750}, {18357,38167}, {18480,18583}, {18483,36990}, {18991,39875}, {18992,39876}, {19862,24206}, {20986,34822}, {21850,28160}, {28164,31670}, {35762,39893}, {35763,39894}</p>
<p>
X(39870) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 6776}, {944, 3751}, {1351, 18481}, {1353, 34773}, {10755, 12119}, {11061, 33535}, {39878, 39898}<br>
X(39870) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (10, 182), (946, 1386), (1352, 1125), (3242, 13607), (3416, 6684), (4663, 12007), (18480, 18583), (24476, 12005), (31673, 5480), (34648, 5476), (36990, 18483), (39884, 9955)<br>
X(39870) = complement of X(39885)<br>
X(39870) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 39878, 39898), (10, 182, 38118), (944, 14912, 3751), (1352, 38029, 1125), (3416, 5085, 6684), (6776, 39898, 39878), (18480, 18583, 38146), (36990, 38035, 18483), (38040, 39884, 9955)<br>
</p>
